title: Method to find mode of array - write code

content.question: Which of the following can replace /* missing condition 1 */ and /* missing condition 2 */ so the method works as intended?

choices.label: /* missing condition 1 *//* missing condition 2 */arr[j] == arr[k]valCount > modeCount
/* missing condition 1 *//* missing condition 2 */arr[j] == arr[k]modeCount > valCount
/* missing condition 1 *//* missing condition 2 */arr[j] != arr[k]valCount > modeCount
/* missing condition 1 *//* missing condition 2 */arr[j] != arr[k]modeCount > valCount

content.answer: /* missing condition 1 *//* missing condition 2 */arr[j] == arr[k]valCount > modeCount

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
